Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration
Oversight - NYC Detainer laws
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a private right of action related to civil immigration detainers
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Creating a private right of action related to civil immigration detainers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the circumstances in which a person may be detained by the police department on a civil immigration detainer
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Limiting the circumstances in which a person may be detained by the police department on a civil immigration detainer.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting communication between the department of correction and federal immigration authorities
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Limiting communication between the department of correction and federal immigration authorities.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, the New York for All Act (A.2328 / S.3076), which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: New York for All Act (A.2328 / S.3076)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Moya, Feliz, Brooks-Powers and Dromm
